My Working Process

01

Discuss idea

I compile valuable data using your startup questionaire and our reserach to fully understand your vision industry and demography. we then create detailed wireframe and share our ideas with you.

02

Design

I hand craft various design from scratch focusing on creating a look and feel to fit your brand and speak to your visitors. We present,revise and collaborate with you until we finalize the design.

03

Code

I code and develope your site using powerful technology and advanced back-end management software. I turn my design into a funtioning website and program the varous functionalities that make your website come to life.

04

Action

I carefully inspect the site including extensive mobile and responsive testing to ensure a smooth transition post-launch. I provide training , tutorials and 2months of technical support.
